channel.title: Simple help? any 1 know how to add penguins to trisidiax 317 (PI)?
channel.description: hi can you guys or anyone please please help em add penguins for training , i have trisidiax v3 317 (PI) source, can anyone please give me the npc id and then also instructions on how to code it in or put it in soo it works and i already picked a spot for it and made a teleport for it , but all i need to know is how to add them into my source thanks

item.title: Simple help? any 1 know how to add penguins to trisidiax 317 (PI)?
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

thats not really helping someone, if someone knows how to add them properly then please come back here and reply thankyou

Read full topic
item.source: Simple help? any 1 know how to add penguins to trisidiax 317 (PI)?

item.title: Simple help? any 1 know how to add penguins to trisidiax 317 (PI)?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“malimt, post:5, topic:483277”][quote author=ohokay link=topic=601511.msg4219733#msg4219733 date=1360660954]
Adding npcs? This is common sense. Look in your cfg folder and you’ll find npc-spawns, or spawns.cfg.
[/quote] yes npc id is 131 , i checked , i added it to spawn-config.cfg and it didnt show up where i wanted it
and it just didnt work, the server got errors, i tried alot of things, …[/quote]
post errors

Read full topic
item.source: Simple help? any 1 know how to add penguins to trisidiax 317 (PI)?

item.title: Simple help? any 1 know how to add penguins to trisidiax 317 (PI)?
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

[quote=“Creative I, post:8, topic:483277”][quote author=malimt link=topic=601511.msg4220386#msg4220386 date=1360707319]
yes i did put the correct cords but still doesn’t work at all
[/quote]

Can you post the code so we can see what it looks like ?[/quote]
and this below is what i got from npc.cfg i believe this is the npc code for penguin… and this is already on my npc.cfg
npc = 131 Penguin 2 4

this below is what i put in uhm spawn-config.cfg
spawn = 131 2860 5265 2 0 1 1 1 penguin
